name: Platform Builder Standard 5.3
description:
Platform Builder is a project designed to allow its users to create their own platform games without the need for programming skills. The program is designed to be user-friendly, and quick to learn, yet powerful and sophisticated to allow maximum creativity. You are in command to design your own character, levels, over-worlds, enemies, item shops, and more. The program also has a built in assistant which tells you useful information as you go, and contains knowledge for almost any element in the Builder.

Games and levels can be shared and played straight from Platform Builder, giving you the opportunity to publish your creations and check out what other people have done.
